title: How Technology is Decoding Our Cosmic Blueprint
description: In the last decade, we have witnessed a fascinating shift in how ancient practices intersect with modern technology. Gone are the days of vague newspaper horoscopes written by generalists. Today, the “mystical” industry has undergone a massive digital transformation, leveraging big data, precise astronomical algorithms, and artificial intelligence to deliver hyper-personalized insights. title: KP to introduce AI in school curriculum from Grade 6
description: The Khyber Pakhtunkhwa government has decided to formally introduce Artificial Intelligence (AI) as part of the school curriculum from grade six to grade twelve,
content:

title: Turning Data Into Decisions: How the School of Sciences at JAIN (Deemed
description: New Delhi [India], January 31: In today's digital-first world, data is not just information--it is insight, strategy, and competitive advantage. From healthcare and finance to e-commerce and artificial intelligence, organisations rely on data to make smarter, faster, and more responsible decisions. At the School of Sciences (SSc), JAIN (Deemed-to-be University), this reality is shaping a new kind of undergraduate education through BSc Data Science, a Program designed to transform analytical curiosity into industry-ready expertise.
